user.title: Set up Cat Scale
user.description:
Configure your cat scale integration.

• Source sensor: Select the weight sensor entity to use as the source for this integration. It should have device class 'weight'.
• Cat weight threshold: The minimum weight (in grams) to detect your cat. Set to your cat's average weight minus 20–30%.
• Minimum presence time: The minimum time (in seconds) the cat must be present to count as a visit. Use your cat's average litterbox time minus 10–20%.
• Leave timeout: Time (in seconds) after the cat leaves before ending the visit. Increase if your cat often returns quickly.
• After-cat standard deviation: Used to detect when the weight has stabilized after a visit. Default is usually fine.

For more details, see the README: https://github.com/djbios/home-assistant-cat-scale?tab=readme-ov-file#algorithm-overview
